name: mattschaller/home-assistant
description: Hass.io configuration for local hub running Ubuntu 16.04.  Includes a MQTT bridge to communicate with Samsung SmartThings Hub.  Current IoT ecosystem includes bluetooth, wireless, IR/RF, and ZigBee devices.  Current hubs include Alexa and Samsung Smartthings.

scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified.  Bypassing error." && exit 0

author: matt schaller
